metadata.synopsis: Gregory Bright, Refugee_14, is worried about Gronch, who aided him and his brother to get this far.

0.speaker: Gregory Bright
0.text: When Nealos and me were hiding and hungry and scared, it was Gronch who got us through. I'm not letting him down now.

1.speaker: Gregory Bright
1.text: Don't know how we're going to get Gronch into the city, wounded as he is. But we have to.
